name: WTARankings
0:
”Alexa, open w. t. a. Rankings and get the current ranking of Serena Williams”
”Alexa, open w. t. a. Rankings and get the current number three player”
”Alexa, open w. t. a. Rankings and get the top 10 players”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: w. t. a. rankings
des:
This unofficial skill provides the current WTA rankings. You can say, what is the current ranking of a particular player, who is the current number one player, who are the current top 10 players.

HOW TO USE:

To Get Started: Say "Alexa Open w. t. a. Rankings". 

Say "What is the current ranking of {player name}"
For example "What is the current ranking of Karolina Pliskova"

{player name} - Player Name (ex. Karolina Pliskova, Simona Halep, Garbiñe Muguruza, Serena Villiams etc)

Say "Who is the current number {ranking} player"
For example "Who is the current number one player"

{ranking} - No (1 - 200)

Say "Who are the current top {index} players in the world"
For example "Who are the current top 10 players in the world"

{index} - No (1 - 25)

For any of the above interactions, you can also use the one-shot phrasing.

For example 
"Open w. t. a. Rankings and get the current ranking of Serena Williams"
"Open w. t. a. Rankings and get the current number three player"
"Open w. t. a. Rankings and get the top 5 players"
